Function reference

All functions

arima_tidy()
Fit ARIMA models via formula
augment(<arima_tidy>)
Augment data with information from an arima_tidy object
calculate_surveillance_residuals()
Combine the most recent data points from a sequence of data frames
collapse()
Merge entries into a list of length 1
collapse_all()
Merge rows from each group into a list
create_zones()
Create zones from spatial coordinates
extract_yhat(<Arima>) extract_yhat(<forecast_ARIMA>) extract_yhat(<arima_tidy>)
Extract fitted values from an ARIMA model
extract_yhat()
Extract fitted values from a model object
glance_inla()
Summarize an INLA model
NM_county_sf
Geographical boundaries for counties in New Mexico
NM_data
Population and brain cancer cases in New Mexico, 1973 - 1991
pad_spacetime_data()
Pad a spacetime data frame
parallel_cusum_gaussian()
Calculate the Gaussian CUSUM statistic over multiple spatial regions
parallel_cusum_gaussian2()
Calculate the Gaussian CUSUM statistic over multiple spatial regions
parallel_cusum_poisson()
Calculate the Poisson CUSUM statistic over multiple spatial regions
parallel_cusum_poisson2()
Calculate the Poisson CUSUM statistic over multiple spatial regions
parallel_shewhart_gaussian()
Calculate the Gaussian Shewhart alarm statistic over multiple spatial regions
parallel_shewhart_gaussian2()
Calculate the Gaussian Shewhart alarm statistic over multiple spatial regions
pivot_for_scan()
Turn a long data frame into a wide matrix
predict(<arima_tidy>)
Forecast from arima_tidy fits
prepare_training_data()
Prepare data for prediction in statistical surveillance
presidents_df
Quarterly Approval Ratings of US Presidents
remove_overlapping_clusters()
Remove overlapping clusters from scan statistics
report_top_clusters()
Extract clusters identified by scanning alarm functions
rowmute()
Apply mutate rowwise
scan_bayes_negbin2()
Calculate the negative binomial bayesian scan statistic..
scan_cusum_poisson()
Calculate the CUSUM statistic over a set of spatial-temporal zones
scan_cusum_poisson2()
Calculate the CUSUM statistic over a set of spatial-temporal zones
scan_eb_negbin2()
Calculate the expectation-based negative binomial scan statistic.
scan_eb_negbin_fast()
Calculate the expectation-based negative binomial scan statistic via linear algebra
scan_eb_negbin_fast2()
Calculate the expectation-based negative binomial scan statistic via linear algebra
scan_eb_poisson2()
Calculate the expectation-based Poisson scan statistic.
scan_eb_poisson_fast()
Calculate the expectation-based Poisson scan statistic via linear algebra
scan_eb_poisson_fast2()
Calculate the expectation-based Poisson scan statistic via linear algebra
scan_eb_zip2()
Calculate the expectation-based ZIP scan statistic.
scan_pb_poisson2()
Calculate the population-based Poisson scan statistic.
scan_permutation2()
Calculate the space-time permutation scan statistic.
spacetime_data
Data frames including information on space and time
statsurv
statsurv: A package for developing and performing statistical surveillance
zones_to_key_matrix() key_matrix_to_zones()
Change how spatial zones are represented
tidy_inla()
Report information about the components of an INLA model
unlist_scalars()
Convert list columns back to regular columns where possible
validate_spacetime_data()
Check that a data frame is formatted as a valid spacetime data frame
window_idtime()
Divide data into overlapping windows
